Attn: Human Resources or Personnel Dept.

 

Dear Sir or Madam:

 

I am seeking a permanent full time position in a field related to software and/or web development. I am a highly motivated individual and have a diverse and experienced background.

I am accustomed to a fast-paced environment where deadlines are a priority and handling multiple jobs simultaneously is a requirement. My experience includes web application development, website construction, software development, sales and merchandising, computer repair and customer service. I am seeking a position that offers challenge, responsibility and opportunity to grow and learn more.

I would appreciate the opportunity for an interview to discuss any job opportunities you may have now or in the near future. I am certain that I could become a valuable addition to your staff and would appreciate discussing this in a personal interview at your convenience.

My resume is here for your review and I have references available upon request. I can be reached via email.

 

Sincerely,

Brendon Irwin

Brendon.Irwin@gmail.com
